Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Air conditioning pack failure. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 05/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
